entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Placentia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:51 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 12.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 12 except low minus 18 in low lying inland areas. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 12 except low minus 18 in low lying inland areas. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023
